column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. tawshīḥ raml lābin sa‘īd al-miknāsī

column2: fī ḥālat al-bu‘d rūḥī kunt ursiluhā

column3: fāumdud yamīnak kay taḥẓá bihā shafatī

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. inqilāb al-raml. birūālatin l‘lāl al-shrāblī al-marrākishī

column3: man lā khlaq al-lah fī al-smā walā fī al-ārḍ ābḥāluh

column2: bāsmk yā raḥmān ārḥīm ḥullah nbdāhā
fī mdīḥ al-mukhtār rāḥtī rūḥī wmnāhā
column3: dīnī wmadhhabī wmilltī khālṣ nhdīhā luh

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. inqilāb al-raml. qaṣīdah. ṭawīl

column3: famā mithluh wal-lah fī al-khalq shāfi‘

column2: wānṭaq waqāl al-shafā‘ah yā rasūl al-lah
wanqūl yā rasūl al-lah yā khayr al-anām

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. raml al-māyah. qaṣīdah. ṭawīl
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥusayn. qaṣīdah. mjzū’ al-rajaz

column2: in talqah al-usd fī ājāmihā tajim
man ya‘taṣim bik yā khayr al-wará sharafan
